title: Redstone-Powered Door
scenario: A player builds a redstone-powered door that opens when stepping on a pressure plate.

title: Automated Crop Farm with Pistons
scenario: A player constructs an automated crop farm using water channels and pistons.

title: Torch Placement Optimization
scenario: A player optimizes the placement of torches to prevent monster spawning.

title: Stronghold Navigation with Coordinates
scenario: A player uses coordinates to locate a stronghold using Eyes of Ender.

title: Redstone Elevator Debugging
scenario: A player walks through a redstone elevator trying to figure out why it is failing to activate.

title: Hopper Sorting Experimentation
scenario: A player experiments with hopper placement to automate item sorting.

title: Minecart Transport System
scenario: A player configures a minecart system to transport items across multiple stations.

title: AoE Counter Positioning
scenario: A player rearranges units to counter enemy area-of-effect damage.

title: Item Distribution by Synergy
scenario: A player modifies their item distribution based on champion synergies.

title: Opponent Scouting and Prediction
scenario: A player scouts opponents and predicts optimal positioning.

title: Economy Decision-Making
scenario: A player evaluates economy decisions to slow-roll for specific champions.

title: Team Comp Rotation During Carousel
scenario: A player rotates team comps during the carousel round based on item priority.

title: Unexpected Item Drop Adaptation
scenario: A player adapts their board strategy after receiving unexpected item drops.

title: Trait Transition Mid-Game
scenario: A player builds toward a trait bonus and transitions their comp mid-game.

title: Streak Strategy Comparison
scenario: A player compares win streak vs. loss streak strategies to maximize income.

title: Shield Bait Trap
scenario: A player lures an opponent into a trap using shield baiting.

title: Combo Chain Testing
scenario: A player repeats combo sequences to test true combo chains.

title: Edge Guard Timing Adjustment
scenario: A player adjusts edge guarding timing after failed attempts.

title: DI Prediction and Adaptation
scenario: A player predicts opponent DI (directional influence) and adapts.

title: Kill Confirm Comparison
scenario: A player compares two characters kill confirms across different stages.

title: Recovery Mixup to Avoid Punish
scenario: A player mixes up recovery options to avoid being punished at the ledge or off stage.

title: Opening Pattern Recognition
scenario: A player identifies a repeatable opening against a specific playstyle.
